translation: Kya tohyhi vuchhvvnh suh shkhṣ yus dyins chuh ankar kran?
Yhi chuh suh shkhṣ yus ytyms dkh chuh divan (yʿny ytymn chuhnh ḥajt krran th timn chuh ḥq nishhi mḥrvm thavan).
Th mḥtajs chuhnh khyn khyavnh khạṭr aatthkl divan (yʿny mʿāshrs mnzchuhnh ghrybn th mḥtajn hundmʿạshy aistḥṣal khtm krnch kvshsh kran).
Lhādha afsvs (th khraby) chhe timn nmazi gzarn khạṭr.
Yim pnnhi nmazi (hndi rvḥ) nishhi be khbr chih (yʿny timn chih mḥẓ Allah tʿālyā sndụ̄ ḥqvq yad, ansann hndụ̄ ḥqvq chihkh mshrạvimtụ̄).
Tim lukh chih (ʿbadts mnz) ryakạry kran (tikyazi tim chih khạlq snz rsmy bndgy kran th pishnh āmthi mkhlvq nishhi chih laprvạhy vrtavan).
Byyhi chihnh tim vartavnkụ̄ mʿmvly chyzthi mngith divan.
